nonnumeric.name: StatementThatDirectorsAcknowledgeTheirResponsibilitiesUnderCompaniesAct
nonnumeric.text: The directors acknowledge their responsibilities for:(a)ensuring that the company keeps accounting records which comply with Sections 386 and 387 of the Companies Act 2006 and (b)preparing financial statements which give a true and fair view of the state of affairs of the company as at the end of each financial year and of its profit or loss for each financial year in accordance with the requirements of Sections 394 and 395 and which otherwise comply with the requirements of the Companies Act 2006 relating to financial statements, so far as applicable to the company.

nonnumeric.name: StatementComplianceWithApplicableReportingFramework

The financial statements have been prepared under the historical cost convention.

nonnumeric.name: RevenueRecognitionPolicy
nonnumeric.text: Turnover is measured at the fair value of the consideration received or receivable, excluding discounts, rebates,value added tax and other sales taxes.
nonnumeric.value: Turnover is measured at the fair value of the consideration received or receivable, excluding discounts, rebates,value added tax and other sales taxes.

nonnumeric.name: DescriptionMeasurementBasisForPropertyPlantEquipment
nonnumeric.text: Depreciation is provided at the following annual rates in order to write off each asset over its estimated useful life.
nonnumeric.value: Depreciation is provided at the following annual rates in order to write off each asset over its estimated useful life.

nonnumeric.name: DescriptionMeasurementBasisForPropertyPlantEquipment
nonnumeric.text: 15% on cost and 15% on reducing balance
nonnumeric.value: 15% on cost and 15% on reducing balance

nonnumeric.name: TaxPolicy
nonnumeric.text: Taxation for the year comprises current and deferred tax. Tax is recognised in the Income Statement, except tothe extent that it relates to items recognised in other comprehensive income or directly in equity.Current or deferred taxation assets and liabilities are not discounted.Current tax is recognised at the amount of tax payable using the tax rates and laws that have been enacted orsubstantively enacted by the balance sheet date.
nonnumeric.value: Taxation for the year comprises current and deferred tax. Tax is recognised in the Income Statement, except tothe extent that it relates to items recognised in other comprehensive income or directly in equity.Current or deferred taxation assets and liabilities are not discounted.Current tax is recognised at the amount of tax payable using the tax rates and laws that have been enacted orsubstantively enacted by the balance sheet date.

nonnumeric.name: DeferredTaxPolicy
nonnumeric.text: Deferred tax is recognised in respect of all timing differences that have originated but not reversed at the balancesheet date.Timing differences arise from the inclusion of income and expenses in tax assessments in periods different fromthose in which they are recognised in financial statements. Deferred tax is measured using tax rates and laws thathave been enacted or substantively enacted by the year end and that are expected to apply to the reversal of thetiming difference.Unrelieved tax losses and other deferred tax assets are recognised only to the extent that it is probable that theywill be recovered against the reversal of deferred tax liabilities or other future taxable profits.
nonnumeric.value: Deferred tax is recognised in respect of all timing differences that have originated but not reversed at the balancesheet date.Timing differences arise from the inclusion of income and expenses in tax assessments in periods different fromthose in which they are recognised in financial statements. Deferred tax is measured using tax rates and laws thathave been enacted or substantively enacted by the year end and that are expected to apply to the reversal of thetiming difference.Unrelieved tax losses and other deferred tax assets are recognised only to the extent that it is probable that theywill be recovered against the reversal of deferred tax liabilities or other future taxable profits.

nonnumeric.name: LeasesPolicy
nonnumeric.text: Rentals paid under operating leases are charged to profit or loss on a straight line basis over the period of thelease.
nonnumeric.value: Rentals paid under operating leases are charged to profit or loss on a straight line basis over the period of thelease.

nonnumeric.name: DefinedContributionPensionsPolicy
nonnumeric.text: The company operates a defined contribution pension scheme.  Contributions payable to the company's pensionscheme are charged to profit or loss in the period to which they relate.
nonnumeric.value: The company operates a defined contribution pension scheme.  Contributions payable to the company's pensionscheme are charged to profit or loss in the period to which they relate.
